author: Uszaty
name: Metro
description:
A Windows8-like theme for cinnamon.

This is a blue version with menu colors similar to Start8.

 

What you should to get pure Windows 8 look:

  1. Change bottom panel height to 38px
  2. Change your metacity theme to Windows 8 modern UI (metro)
  3. Change your gtk theme to Windows 8 modern UI (metro)
  4. Change your X11 cursor theme to Windows 8 cursors
  5. Install Window List with App Grouping applet
  6. Install Show desktop ++ applet by mohammad-sn.
  7. To get Windows date format in taskbar – Change the Calendar applet's date format to "%H:%M%n%m-%e-%Y"
